content:
DataGridRowDetailsVisibilityMode Enum

Definition

Defines constants that specify when DataGrid row details are displayed.

In this Article

public enum DataGridRowDetailsVisibilityMode
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
System.Enum
DataGridRowDetailsVisibilityMode

Remarks

This enumeration is used by the RowDetailsVisibilityMode property.

Fields

Collapsed

The row details section is not displayed for any rows.
Visible

The row details section is displayed for all rows.
VisibleWhenSelected

The row details section is displayed only for selected rows.
